"Set the default to 'Open'" - Impressions from the OpenCon2014

Posted on November 26, 2014

In November 2014, 150 early-career researchers and students met in Washington D.C. for OpenCon, organized by the Right to Research Coalition, to talk about the movement to open science up - be it through Open Access to published literature, Open Data, or Open Educational Resources. Posted on November 17, 2014
